Pre-Game Insights: Both teams would be fighting to stay alive in the Asia Cup tournament and the match between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh is expected to go down the wire.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka and Bangladesh will face off against each other to stay alive and qualify for the Super Four stage in the Asia Cup 2022, on 1st September (Thursday)
Others: SL vs BAN Head-to-Head: Total – 12, Sri Lanka – 8, Bangladesh – 4
